Very energetic, good message, excellent presenter.

author: Erin Perez
text:
We are looking for a hands on customer service training for our front line staff as well as customer service training for the whole department to get everyone involved and engaged with the principles of customer service. Do you have trainers in the San Jose/ San Francisco, CA area?
City of Palo Alto, Community Services Department
title: Customer Service Trainings
